verbose_text: Macrophages stimulated with live non typeable Haemophilus influenzae (NTHi), the most common airway colonizing bacterium in COPD, promoted a potent IFN-gamma response from MAIT cells, providing strong evidence that NTHi is a target of MAIT cell immunity.
evidence: COPD, promoted a potent IFN-gamma response from MAIT cells, providing strong evidence that NTHi is a target of MAIT cell immunity
